objects.name: oak_tree
objects.prompt: a single oak tree with a thick trunk and a full canopy of green leaves, isolated on a plain white background, fully visible and centered

objects.name: rose_bush
objects.prompt: a dense rose bush with vibrant red roses and lush green leaves, centered and isolated on a clean white background

objects.name: garden_bench
objects.prompt: a wooden garden bench with slatted back and armrests, fully visible and centered on a white background, object-level view

objects.name: stone_path
objects.prompt: a short segment of a stone path made of flat, natural stones, isolated and centered on a plain white background

objects.name: water_fountain
objects.prompt: a small round water fountain made of stone, with gently flowing water, isolated on a white background, clearly visible and centered
